name: Farm The Sequence Definitive Edition
description:
Full playable version of my game "Farm the Sequence", let me know if you want a specific new feature or share your opinion about this game.

HOW TO PLAY

- The goal is to guess the correct sequence.

- Choose the game mode

    - Casual, play quiet without pressure, without limits.
    - Time, play against time.
    - Limited, you have a limited number of turns.

- Select your options by clicking with the mouse

- The game will indicate if your choice is correct or not

HAVE FUN !
